data.title: Operation Gladio UK equivalent - a Freedom of Information request to Ministry of Defence
data.meta_description:
I am aware that the MOD has had these 3 requests on Operation "Gladio" which have essentially received a negative response.

https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/operation_gladio_false_flag_terr
https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/operation_gladio
https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/exercise_waterland_etc_1989_deta

What has become known as Operation Gladio, was originally a name for the Italian part of the greater operation. 
Could you tell me what the British/ UK part of this wider Operation was called, and the name of the wider Operation

Yours faithfully,

Barbara Jones
data.text:
Dear Ministry of Defence,

I am aware that the MOD has had these 3 requests on Operation "Gladio" which have essentially received a negative response.

https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/o...

https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/o...

https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/request/e...

What has become known as Operation Gladio, was originally a name for the Italian part of the greater operation.

Could you tell me what the British/ UK part of this wider Operation was called, and the name of the wider Operation

Yours faithfully,

Barbara Jones
